DOC.brief_summary: A single-nucleotide polymorphism (SNP) analysis of DNA obtained from peripheral blood of the obese patients and the normal control will be performed to find genetic marker for obesity
DOC.brief_title: Investigation of Genetic Marker Associated With Obesity in Koreans
DOC.criteria: BMI 25~30kg/m2 All were nonsmokers and had no evidence of cancer, liver, renal, hematological disease or other metabolic disorders other than obesity
